FileNotFound_resources: Folder or file not found in update_resources. Check if you deleted any resources/modify anything in the update .zip file
FileNotFound_new: Folder or file not found in the minecraft folder/sub-directories. Check if you modified any SOURCE FOLDERS (not files)/ modified folder structure in the minecraft folder

PermissionError: Folder or file not permitted to access. Check if any of the files or sub-directories are readonly or only runnable as admin. Hidden system files can also cause problems.
